title: Problem with Mac league
body: So I have been having a problem over the last 2 days where I have had 2 reinstall league twice it seems to happens whenever I fully close league or maybe when I turn my comp off and back on it says there is an error with the patcher kernel it then proceeds to not let me open the client no matter what I try I was wondering if anyone else had this problem or a potential solution

replies.body: Update redownloading is not working now please help
It now is working though I would like ideas 2 fix it without redownloading in the future

Glad to hear it's working now! Patching problems can be for a variety of reasons. Check out the [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-mac) for a list of steps that should prevent this in the future.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
